name: Ventus
startIntroPart1: Butter is my name. A funny name.
startIntroPart2: The Ventus empire. The empire of true millitary
introduction: My name is Butter Light.The great leader of The Ventus empire
tradeRequest: We want to trade.Just a fair trade.
uniqueText: The Nation of great millitary. Cities are razed 100 times as fast. Great General is earned -100% faster. +33% Strength when below -10 Happiness. Damage is ignored when determining unit Strength. All healing effects doubled. +2 Air Interception Range. No defensive terrain penalty.
uniques: Cities are razed [100] times as fast
Damage is ignored when determining unit Strength

name: Regulor
startIntroPart2: The Regulor empire. The regular empire
declaringWar: This battle will decide our fate
defeated: We will wait for revenge in the hell.
uniqueText: The Nation that has nothing special. Cities are razed 100 times as fast
uniques: Cities are razed [100] times as fast
